channel.title: Blog on Oakestra
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Oakestra

item.title: Unveiling Oakestra Dashboard v0.4.207: Enhanced Visibility and Control for Your Distributed Infrastructure
item.description: This latest update focuses on improving resource monitoring and streamlining essential management tasks, empowering you to optimize your Oakestra clusters with unprecedented clarity.

item.title: Oakestra Shines at ACM EuroSys + ASPLOS 2025
item.description: Discover how Oakestra took center stage at ACM EuroSys + ASPLOS 2025 in Rotterdam, Netherlands, with multiple awards and groundbreaking insights into edge computing orchestration.

item.title: Oakestra releases v0.4.4 (Bass)
item.description: We are proud to announce that Oakestra v0.4.4 (codename: Bass ðŸŽ¸) is here! This is the second major release for Oakestra and it packs several goodies!

item.title: Oakestra releases v0.4.301 (Accordion)
item.description: We are proud to announce that Oakestra v0.4.301 (codename: Accordion ðŸª—) is here! This is also the first major release for Oakestra and marks the beginning of a periodic release cycle.
